description:
Lina and Gourry start investigating a way to stop Shabranigoodoo`s resurrection, however they are plagued with a question. Why is Zelgadis trying to revive the Demon Lord?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dash! Run for It! My Magic Doesn`t Work!
Dash! 逃げろ! 魔法が使えない?
Daţi-i drumul! Nu are efect magia mea?
Блин! Беги со всех ног! Моя магия не действует?
